assessment.name: Clinical Participation Assessment (CPA)
assessment.weight: Performance hurdle. Students must meet this criterion regardless of the overall course marks.

assessment.name: Evidence of Learning and Achievement Report
assessment.weight: Contributes to Summative Supplementary WLP Review

assessment.weight: Submit prescribed number in the semester to pass the Supplementary WLP course

assessment.name: Summative Supplementary WLP Review
assessment.weight: Performance hurdle. Students must pass regardless of the overall course marks.

assessment.name: Learning Plan
assessment.weight: Contributes to Summative Supplementary WLP Review

assessment.name: DOPS and COPS
assessment.weight: Submit prescribed number in the semester to pass the Supplementary WLP course
